query:
UPDATE `courses` SET `curriculum` = 'Module 1: Reading Comprehension (Weeks 1-3)
• Understanding main ideas and supporting details
• Identifying author''s purpose and tone
• Analyzing literary devices and rhetorical strategies
• Practice with passage-based questions

Module 2: Writing and Language (Weeks 4-6)
• Grammar rules and conventions
• Sentence structure and clarity
• Effective word choice and style
• Editing and revision strategies

Module 3: Essay Writing (Weeks 7-9)
• Analyzing prompts and planning responses
• Developing strong thesis statements
• Supporting arguments with evidence
• Time management and practice essays

Module 4: Test Strategies (Weeks 10-12)
• Full-length practice tests
• Score analysis and improvement areas
• Test-day strategies and time management
• Final review and confidence building' WHERE `subject` = 'English' OR `title` LIKE '%SAT%' LIMIT 2;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WQULgVDBb1t2sq.root --database jiuvaqiRLMtCC23XtAnX7G --execute UPDATE `courses` SET `curriculum` = 'Module 1: Reading Comprehension (Weeks 1-3)
• Understanding main ideas and supporting details
• Identifying author''s purpose and tone
• Analyzing literary devices and rhetorical strategies
• Practice with passage-based questions

Module 2: Writing and Language (Weeks 4-6)
• Grammar rules and conventions
• Sentence structure and clarity
• Effective word choice and style
• Editing and revision strategies

Module 3: Essay Writing (Weeks 7-9)
• Analyzing prompts and planning responses
• Developing strong thesis statements
• Supporting arguments with evidence
• Time management and practice essays

Module 4: Test Strategies (Weeks 10-12)
• Full-length practice tests
• Score analysis and improvement areas
• Test-day strategies and time management
• Final review and confidence building' WHERE `subject` = 'English' OR `title` LIKE '%SAT%' LIMIT 2;
